name: Aceternity UI
description: A skewed grid layout with Title, description and a header component

props.Description: The class name of the child component.

props.Type: {title: string, description: string, header: ReactNode, icon: ReactNode}
props.Description: items that you can map through, passed as props to the BentoGridItem component
